content: bundle of yarn through large hole at base of first earflap bet 2 decrease sts of row 10 and pull to even lengths of yarn on either side of hole tie overhand knot just below base of earflap divide strands of yarn into three groups according to colour and braid/plait to desired length fasten with overhand knot and trim to neaten repeat for second earflap ensuring that tassels are an equal length you are free to make these beanies for personal use and gifts and are also welcome to sell the finished products just be kind and give design credit where it is due however please do not copy this pattern or any part thereof including the picture and distribute it or sell it as your own for more crochet ideas and pattern links you are very welcome to follow me on https //www facebook com/craftycreations07/ or https //za pinterest com/craftycreations07/ happy crocheting kirstin j 9
